name: Idle Subway Tycoon
description:
Idle Subway Tycoon has simple gameplay to manage your train stations, where you can earn currency and unlock new levels. In the train, manager simulator upgrades your level for more profit and completes the idle game for the incremental game! Earn more and more and unlock a new train station in train idle recreation game! Once you've revealed trains you will be able to open through tap tycoon for time management & money. Manage your train station, and raise profits. Increase trains earn by upgrading more idle subway station.

Idle Subway tycoon is for railway lovers, who love idle tycoon games! It’s time to put your train sim on the station and build an idle subway empire. Become a railway tycoon and enjoy train simulation incremental clicker game 2019. Idle metro tycoon is all about upgrading and maintaining subway growing money. Upgrade and connect more stations to get new Idle Subways, earn more money and upgrade your metro!

Manage the idle subway crowd system in Idle Subway game 2019. Simply tap tap increase your balance in idle subway tycoon game. Drop off your passengers all at destination in railway empire idle station. Upgrade trains, to build and manage an Idle Subway tourism empire and become the biggest railway tycoon in the Idle Subway station tycoon.

Train clicker tycoon is a unique idle game which travels from one station to another collect coins, earn dollars, and upgrade your train tycoon business. In Idle Subway tycoon, you can open new trains route for passenger demand. Idle Subway tycoon is an addictive idle game where you will manage all your platforms and station master as idle subway business tycoon. Idle click tycoon game assigns your earnings and upgrades your platforms & station effectively!
